Schnittstelle Zugriffsverwaltung

Alle Superschnittstellen:
Remote
Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
ZugriffsverwaltungImpl
public interface Zugriffsverwaltung extends Remote
Remote interface for managing user access such as registration, login, logout, account editing, and deletion.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    void
    delete_account(String username, String password)
    Deletes the specified user account.
    void
    edit_account(String username, String new_username, String old_password, String new_password)
    Edits account details such as username or password.
    void
    login(String username, String password)
    Logs a user into their account.
    void
    logout(String username)
    Logs a user out of the system.
    void
    register(String username, String password, String repeat_password)
    Registers a new user account.

  • Methodendetails

    • register

      void register(String username, String password, String repeat_password) throws IOException
      Registers a new user account.
      Parameter:
      username - the desired username
      password - the password to set
      repeat_password - the repeated password for confirmation
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      IOException

    • login

      void login(String username, String password) throws RemoteException
      Logs a user into their account.
      Parameter:
      username - the username to log in
      password - the corresponding password
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • logout

      void logout(String username) throws RemoteException
      Logs a user out of the system.
      Parameter:
      username - the username to log out
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • edit_account

      void edit_account(String username, String new_username, String old_password, String new_password) throws Exception
      Edits account details such as username or password.
      Parameter:
      username - the current username
      new_username - the new username to set
      old_password - the current password
      new_password - the new password to set
      Löst aus:
      Exception - if the operation fails (e.g. password mismatch or unavailable username)

    • delete_account

      void delete_account(String username, String password) throws RemoteException
      Deletes the specified user account.
      Parameter:
      username - the username of the account to delete
      password - the password to verify before deletion
      Löst aus:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
